about_the_game:
That’s not a DLC… That’s a DLC! Unleash your inner battler with this set of dinky-di Australia-themed Customization options. Provides instant access to selected items normally accessed via leveling up for the Australians.

Provides instant access to selected items normally accessed via leveling up for the Australian Army.

  • Sweat Rag Bandanna
  • Slouch Hat
  • Aussie Flag Pilot Helmet
  • Aussie Flag w/ Visor Pilot Helmet
  • Chevron Moustache
  • Horseshoe Moustache
  • Southern Cross Tattoo
  • Aussie Flag Tattoo
  • Kangaroo Tattoo
detailed_description:
That’s not a DLC… That’s a DLC! Unleash your inner battler with this set of dinky-di Australia-themed Customization options. Provides instant access to selected items normally accessed via leveling up for the Australians.

Provides instant access to selected items normally accessed via leveling up for the Australian Army.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @ 2.5GHz or AMD Phenom @ 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or ATI Radeon HD 5850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: UNSUPPORTED HARDWARE: 32-bit Operating Systems

short_description: That’s not a DLC… That’s a DLC! Unleash your inner battler with this set of dinky-di Australia-themed Customization options. Provides instant access to selected items normally accessed via leveling up for the Australians.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
